Primordial Entities

Primordial entities are those entities which exist outside of any Creation and express aparent agency or complex behaviour independant of the primordial elements. A primordial entity is usually composed of pure, divine atman, requiring no body of anicca, and is capable of holding total dominion over any amount of anicca it is capable of shaping. Such entities include Gods, and the charon immortals. These entities typically emerge within the Great Beyond.
